name: Spod Blaster
overview: Spod Blaster has been on my harddrive for along time, but I never got round to finnishing it (and probably never will...) because I'm too busy working on a Zelda/Secret of Mana likr RPG (If you are a good music composer and want to help then please contact me.), but I decided that I may as well release a version of it, so I quickly slapped up an options screen and this is the result
